resources.string:
Authors
 • SexyTopo is written and maintained by Rich Smith (rls@hwyl.org), copyright 2018
 • Launcher icon design by "Zularizal"




Thanks To
 • Long-suffering Ruth "Rufus" Allan for love and support
 • Andrew Atkinson for the initial idea and extensive input
 • Madphil for testing and ideas
 • Hellie Brooke / David Powlesland / Andrew Atkinson for loan of equipment




Availability
 SexyTopo is available on the Play Store, F-Droid, or directly from https://github.com/richsmith/sexytopo (including source). Contributions are welcome.
